nl.surfnet.oda

Class NetworkError

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.surfnet.oda.NetworkError

  • public class NetworkError
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a RetrofitError, and converts it's data to more readable formats.
    Author:
    Daniel Zolnai
